definition: Jinta county in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Jinta county in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
see 麥金塔電腦|麦金塔电脑[Mai4 jin1 ta3 dian4 nao3]
Macintosh (brand of computers made by Apple)/Mac

sentences.english: People visit the Shwedagon Pagoda during the yellow robe weaving festival in Yangon, Burma (Myanmar).
sentences.chinese: 在緬甸傳統的直桑岱點燈節，人們參觀仰光大金塔。

sentences.english: My first computer ever was a 128K Macintosh.
sentences.chinese: 我第一臺電腦就是128K的麥金塔電腦。

sentences.english: A new game for Mac computers will be released in February.
sentences.chinese: 一款麥金塔電腦上的新遊戲將在二月份發行。

sentences.english: To the south east of the Quinta lies the Rio Formosa Estuary, which has extensive salt pans.
sentences.chinese: 在南面的金塔東鄰約臺塑口，其中有廣泛的鹽田。

sentences.english: The first thing one sees on arrival is the huge golden tower.
sentences.chinese: 來到這裏人們最先看到的就是大金塔。

sentences.english: In front of the hall is a grand urn made of variegated dark jade.
sentences.chinese: 前面的大廳是一個大金塔了形形色色黑玉。

sentences.english: Because of this underground palace, the pagoda is called the Wanfo (10,000-Buddha) Gold Pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 所以這座地宮就被叫做萬佛金塔地宮。

sentences.english: The first thing one sees on arrival in Myanmar is the huge golden tower.
sentences.chinese: 來到緬甸最先看到的就是大金塔。

sentences.english: Daniel, this is the Yangqi Temple's Wanfo Gold Pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，這裏就是楊岐寺的萬佛金塔。

definition: Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
Buddha's teachings/aura (around the head of Buddha)
Jinsha county in Bijie prefecture 畢節地區|毕节地区[Bi4 jie2 di4 qu1], Guizhou/Chinsha town in Kinmen County 金門縣|金门县[Jin1 men2 xian4] (Kinmen or Quemoy islands), Taiwan
glazed tile pagoda/glazed tower of minaret
lama, spiritual teacher in Tibetan Buddhism
stupa/tower venerating the ashes of the Buddha
Yumen county level city in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
